Package nl.qiy.oic.op.api

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationRequest
    http://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html#AuthRequest
    AuthenticationResource
    Handles the AuthenticationRequest as defined in the OpenId Connect spec for the code flow, the implicit flow and the hybrid flow
    AuthenticationResponse
    Given an OAuthUser and an AuthenticationRequest, this class builds a Response URI to which the user should be redirected
    CORSFilter
    If you want to allow access to the OP from other sites using ajax, enable this filter.
    DiscoveryResource
    Helper that should be extended to implement discovery, for now, just do parts
    InputResetFilter
    To make sure that the AuthRequest is available regardless of where we are in the processing, it is stored in the thread.
    OAuthExceptionMapper
    Make sure any exception is handled in a OAuth specified way.
    OpenIDProviderMetadata
    Serializes to JSON, to help with the .well-known/openid-provider request This type is subclassable, so if you want to support other claims, subclass this and go right ahead.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ErrorCode
    Defines the OAuth error codes as defined in RFC6749
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InputException
    Exception that is thrown to indicate that the user's input was incorrect
